alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches; Somerset; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 9:04PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of Somerset, Wicomico, Worcester and east central Dorchester Counties through 1000 PM EST... At 902 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from Sharptown to 6 miles southwest of Hebron to near Deal Island. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salisbury, Ocean City, Fruitland, Pocomoke City, Princess Anne, University Of Maryland Eastern Shore, Salisbury University, Berlin, Delmar, Snow Hill, Hebron, Sharptown, Vienna, Westover, Parsonsburg, Marion Station, Newark, Cape Isle Of Wight, Ocean Pines and Deal Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Dorchester; Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches; Somerset; Wicomico
